DOC.brief_title: A Feasibility Phase II Study Treatment Resected Cholangiocarcinoma , Gallbladder , Pancreatic Ampullary Cancers
DOC.criteria: Patients must biopsyproven , resect curative intent cholangiocarcinoma , gallbladder , pancreatic ampullary adenocarcinoma . Patients must 18 year old . Patients must NCI CTC Performance Status 02 . Patients must prior chemotherapy radiation therapy current malignancy . At least 3 week elapse since surgery require general anesthesia . Patients must prior malignancy except basal squamous skin cancer , cervical carcinomainsitu , unless remission > 5years Pregnant patient eligible . Nonpregnant status determine woman childbearing potential . All patient require use effective mean contraception sexually active therapy . Initial Required Laboratory Values : Absolute neutrophil count ≥ 1,500/mm3 , platelet count ≥ 150 , 000/mm3 , hemoglobin ≥ 9 g/dL . Serum creatinine ≤ 2 mg/dL . Serum bilirubin ≤ 3.0 mg/dL ( biliary stent allow ) . Serum transaminases ≤ 5fold institutional upper limit . Patients must coexist severe medical illness , unstable angina , uncontrolled diabetes mellitus , uncontrolled arrhythmia uncontrolled infection . Patients must able sign inform consent .
